content:
@Dave Register

Looking into #3513 while possible dust from #3520 settles.

s52plib includes ocpn_plugin.h. As it is now, this means including stuff from the main build which a library should not do (it should be self contained).

Easily fixed by bundling ocpn_plugin.h into the library. However, the dependency seems to stem from TexFont. The question the becomes if it would be better to use the ocpn_dc library in opencpn-libs instead to avoid duplicating this code (which must be described as "somewhat messy")

Thoughts?
